nodes.text: The Missile Boat combat medallion was an Imperial starfighter pilot medal awarded for completing basic training with Missile Boats. It had an engraving of an Imperial Missile Boat.

There were three versions of the medal, which differed only in the metal used to create it: bronze, silver, and gold. The bronze version was awarded to pilots who completed training relating to the Missile Boat's dual weapons systems and its onboard anti-warhead defensive measures. The silver version was awarded to pilots who completed training relating to the above as well as a reenactment of a mine-clearing operation. The gold version was presented to pilots who completed the above training operations as well as a mock dogfight against a TIE/D Defender.
Maarek Stele received all three versions of this medal after completing the training ops relating to the Missile Boat during the fight against Demetrius Zaarin.
